subject: British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: 16-year-old Matteo Manassero, the youngest winner of the British amateur championship, shot a final-round 69 and tied for 13th place at two over par.
snippet: 16-year-old Matteo Manassero, the youngest winner of the British amateur championship, shot a final-round 69 and tied for 13th place at two over par.
